title: Lamad Content Display Product Tests
description: BDD product tests validating content loading and display in the Lamad learning system
content:
Feature: Lamad Content Display
  As a learner using Lamad
  I want to view educational content
  So that I can learn and grow

  @smoke @lamad @api
  Scenario: Content API returns data
    Given the backend API is available
    When I request the content list from the API
    Then the response should be successful
    And the response should contain content items
    And each item should have required fields

  @smoke @lamad @navigation
  Scenario: Lamad section loads
    Given I am on the home page
    When I navigate to the Lamad section
    Then the page should load successfully
    And the Lamad content should load

  @lamad @data
  Scenario: Content list displays items
    Given I am on the Lamad section
    Then at least one learning path should be displayed
    And each path should show a title and description

  @lamad @api @data
  Scenario: Assessments are available in content
    Given the backend API is available
    When I request the content list from the API
    Then the response should contain content items
    And at least one assessment should be present

  @lamad @api @data
  Scenario: Features are available in content
    Given the backend API is available
    When I request the content list from the API
    Then the response should contain content items
    And at least one feature should be present

  @lamad @api @data
  Scenario: Concepts are available in content
    Given the backend API is available
    When I request the content list from the API
    Then the response should contain content items
    And at least one concept should be present
